page.title: 05Leisure Activities
page.content:
Leisure activities in Witherley today are church choir, W.I., Bingo, Field Day, dart matches, and football matches.
Activities that used to be in Witherley were play-school, Brownies, Guides and Church Lads' and Girls' Brigade. The reason why Brownies and Guides stopped was that the leader married and lived some where else, which meant she could not attend.
We have done a survey of our class. These are some of the activities that children would like to see:
Cubs Roller skating Scouts Pony club Ranger Guides Over 30's Club Discos Over 60's Club
